briefTitle: The CANTATA-D Trial (CANagliflozin Treatment and Trial Analysis - DPP-4 Inhibitor Comparator Trial)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* All patients must have a diagnosis of T2DM and be currently treated with metformin IR
* Patients in the study must have a HbA1c between \>=7 and \<=10.5%
* Patients must have a fasting plasma glucose (FPG) \<270 mg/dL (15 mmol/L)

Exclusion Criteria:

* History of diabetic ketoacidosis, type 1 diabetes mellitus (T1DM), pancreas or beta cell transplantation, diabetes secondary to pancreatitis or pancreatectomy, or a severe hypoglycemic episode within 6 months before screening

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in HbA1c From Baseline to Week 26
outcomeMeasures.description: The table below shows the least-squares (LS) mean change in HbA1c from Baseline to Week 26 for each treatment group. The statistical analyses show the treatment differences (ie, each canagliflozin or sitagliptin group minus placebo) in the LS mean change.

outcomeMeasures.title: Percentage of Patients With HbA1c <7% at Week 26
outcomeMeasures.description: The table below shows the percentage of patients with HbA1c \<7% at Week 26 in each treatment group. The statistical analyses show the treatment differences between each canagliflozin or sitagliptin group and placebo.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Fasting Plasma Glucose (FPG) From Baseline to Week 26
outcomeMeasures.description: The table below shows the least-squares (LS) mean change in FPG from Baseline to Week 26 for each treatment group. The statistical analyses show the treatment differences (ie, each canagliflozin or sitagliptin group minus placebo) in the LS mean change.

The statistical analyses show the treatment differences (ie, each canagliflozin or sitagliptin group minus placebo) in the LS mean change.
